scripts.scrape: node -e "const u=process.argv[1]; if(!u){console.error('Usage: npm run scrape -- <url>');process.exit(1);} const http=require('http'),fs=require('fs'),body=JSON.stringify({url:u}); const req=http.request({hostname:'localhost',port:3000,path:'/fetch',method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Content-Length':Buffer.byteLength(body)}},res=>{let d='';res.on('data',c=>d+=c);res.on('end',()=>{try{const j=JSON.parse(d);if(j.html){const f='response.html';fs.writeFileSync(f,j.html);console.log('Saved to '+f+' (title: '+j.title+')');}else{console.error('Error:',d);}}catch(e){console.error('Parse error:',e.message);}});});req.on('error',e=>console.error('Request failed:',e.message));req.write(body);req.end();" --
